description: News about Workday Inc., including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Workday Inc.
title_page: Workday Inc. - The New York Times
maintext:
Bits
Salesforce and Workday Form Cloud Alliance
Salesforce.com and Workday, which between them offer enough cloud-based software to run much of a business, announced a deep and pervasive alliance. All the details aren’t available yet, but it’s the biggest step yet by cloud providers to go after the big incumbents.
